divs: sighting detailsi was driving east on rt i-88. i first noticed the object at the 122 mile marker. it was circiling as a blimp would, and at first that is what i thought it was. as i got closer i thought it was a really funny looking blimp. the closer i got, the more i realised it was not a blimp. it was eectangular and was way too big to be one. then it stopped circiling and began to move in a north westerly direction, slow at first, but by the time it began to cross the express way it picked up considerable speed. it was far outpaceing the comercial airline traffic in the sky. i have only seen fighter jets move this fast (although i have seen them move faster). by the time i got to the 128-1\2 mile marker it had again slowed and started circiling. it was many miles north of me at that point. by that time i was able to get my camera out of the case and set to it's highest resilution. i took a few pictures from the side of the road. i only showed one to fox tv, i have a couple more. the object then travled directly north and continued on in a straight line untill it was too far away to see anymore.
